text: kESaiqH Sira#H CaqnnaM pracyu#taqM ~MvA EqtadaqsmAl lOqkAdaga#taM dEvalOqkaM ~MyacCRuqta(gm) haqvirana#BiGArita-maBiqGAryOd-vA#sayati dEvaqtraivaina#d-gamayatiq yadyEka#M kaqpAlaqM naSyEqdEkOq mAsa#H saM~MvathsaqrasyAna#vEtaqH syAdathaq yaja#mAnaqH pramI#yEtaq yad dvE naSyE#tAqM dvau mAsau# saM~MvathsaqrasyAna#vEtauq syAtAqmathaq yaja#mAnaqH pramI#yEta saq~gKyAyOd-vA#sayatiq yaja#mAnasya - [  ]  18
